dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Thank you for saving me from the recycling bin. It's very apparent that this "Friday Night Funkin'" game doesn't like me being in here for too long."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Maybe you can find a workaround for the game trying to delete me mid-song? I know firsthand that programming can be very difficult, so I don't blame you if it cannot be fixed."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Now I know it's because you were working so hard to add me to the game and sing with me!"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "If not, you'll just have to rescue me again when we're all done, ok?~"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Are you ready to sing once more, my love?"
